mapper.select: SELECT A.COMP_APPL_ID AS compApplId , A.APPL_ID AS applId , A.SABUN AS sabun , A.TAA_CD AS taaCd , A.COMP_SYMD AS compSymd , A.COMP_EYMD AS compEymd , A.COMP_MINUTE AS compMinute , A.REASON AS reason , A.CANCEL_YN AS cancleYn , B.COMP_CAN_APPL_ID AS compCanApplId , B.APPL_ID AS canApplId , C.APPL_STATUS_CD AS applStatusCd , D.APPL_STATUS_CD AS canApplStatusCd , CASE WHEN F_WTM_NVL(A.CANCEL_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND C.APPL_STATUS_CD = '99' AND (D.APPL_STATUS_CD IS NULL OR D.APPL_STATUS_CD IN ('22', '32')) THEN CONCAT('취소') ELSE '' END AS endImg FROM WTM_COMP_APPL A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MAX(COMP_CAN_APPL_ID) AS COMP_CAN_APPL_ID, COMP_APPL_ID, APPL_ID, SABUN, REASON FROM WTM_COMP_CAN_APPL GROUP BY COMP_APPL_ID) B ON A.COMP_APPL_ID = B.COMP_APPL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_APPL C ON A.APPL_ID = C.APPL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_APPL D ON B.APPL_ID = D.APPL_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT WCC.TENANT_ID , WCC.ENTER_CD , WCC.SABUN , SUM(WCC.REST_MINUTE) AS REST_MINUTE , MIN(WCC.SYMD) AS SYMD , MAX(WCC.EYMD) AS EYMD FROM WTM_COMP_CREATE WCC WHERE #{ymd} BETWEEN WCC.SYMD AND WCC.EYMD GROUP BY WCC.TENANT_ID, WCC.ENTER_CD, WCC.SABUN) E ON E.SABUN = A.SABUN AND E.SYMD <= A.COMP_SYMD AND E.EYMD >= A.COMP_EYMD WHERE C.APPL_STATUS_CD IN ('21','31','41','99') AND E.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND E.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND E.SABUN = #{sabun}

SELECT WCC.TENANT_ID , WCC.ENTER_CD , WCC.SABUN , SUM(WCC.REST_MINUTE) AS REST_MINUTE , MIN(WCC.SYMD) AS SYMD , MAX(WCC.EYMD) AS EYMD FROM WTM_COMP_CREATE WCC WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND SABUN = #{sabun} AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN WCC.SYMD AND WCC.EYMD GROUP BY WCC.TENANT_ID, WCC.ENTER_CD, WCC.SABUN

SELECT WCA.COMP_APPL_ID , WCA.APPL_ID , WCA.SABUN , WCA.TAA_CD AS taaCd , WCA.COMP_SYMD AS compSymd , WCA.COMP_EYMD AS compEymd , WCA.COMP_MINUTE AS compMinute , WCA.REASON AS reason , WCA.CANCEL_YN AS cancleYn , WCA.UPDATE_DATE , WCA.UPDATE_ID FROM WTM_COMP_APPL WCA WHERE WCA.CANCEL_YN = 'N' AND WCA.SABUN = #{sabun} AND (#{sDate} BETWEEN WCA.COMP_SYMD AND WCA.COMP_EYMD OR #{eDate} BETWEEN WCA.COMP_SYMD AND WCA.COMP_EYMD) ORDER BY WCA.COMP_APPL_ID DESC

SELECT A.APPL_ID AS applId , A.TENANT_ID AS tenentId , A.ENTER_CD AS enterCd , A.APPL_CD AS applCd , A.APPL_SABUN AS applSabun , A.APPL_YMD AS applYmd , A.APPL_STATUS_CD AS applStatusCd , B.COMP_APPL_ID AS compApplId , B.SABUN AS sabun , B.TAA_CD AS taaCd , B.COMP_SYMD AS symd , B.COMP_EYMD AS eymd , B.REASON AS reason , B.COMP_MINUTE AS compMinute , C.TAA_NM AS taaNm , B.CANCEL_YN AS cancelYn , F_WTM_GET_CODE_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, 'APPL_STATUS_CD', A.APPL_STATUS_CD, A.APPL_YMD) AS applStatusNm , SUM(CC.REST_MINUTE) AS restMinute FROM WTM_APPL A INNER JOIN WTM_COMP_APPL B ON A.APPL_ID = B.APPL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_TAA_CODE C ON B.TAA_CD = C.TAA_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_COMP_CREATE CC ON CC.TENANT_ID = A.TENANT_ID AND CC.ENTER_CD = A.ENTER_CD AND CC.SABUN = B.SABUN AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN CC.SYMD AND CC.EYMD WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.APPL_ID = #{applId} AND (A.APPL_SABUN = #{sabun} OR B.SABUN IS NULL OR B.SABUN = #{sabun}) AND (B.CANCEL_YN IS NULL OR B.CANCEL_YN <> 'Y' OR (B.CANCEL_YN = 'Y' AND A.APPL_STATUS_CD = '99')) ORDER BY B.COMP_SYMD

SELECT B.TENANT_ID AS tenantId , B.ENTER_CD AS enterCd , A.SABUN AS sabun , A.TAA_CD AS taaCd , C.YMD AS ymd , A.COMP_SYMD AS symd , A.COMP_EYMD AS eymd , C.TIME_CD_MGR_ID AS timeCdMgrId , C.HOLIDAY_YN AS holidayYn , A.APPL_ID AS applId , F_WTM_NVL(C.WORK_CLOSE_YN, 'N') AS closeYn FROM WTM_COMP_APPL A INNER JOIN WTM_APPL B ON A.APPL_ID = B.APPL_ID AND A.SABUN = B.APPL_SABUN INNER JOIN WTM_WORK_CALENDAR C ON B.TENANT_ID = C.TENANT_ID AND B.ENTER_CD = C.ENTER_CD AND B.APPL_SABUN = C.SABUN AND A.SABUN = C.SABUN AND C.YMD BETWEEN A.COMP_SYMD AND A.COMP_EYMD WHERE B.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND B.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND B.APPL_SABUN = #{sabun} AND B.APPL_ID = #{applId}
